dcterms:description: Montezuma's Revenge is a hard exploration environment in the Atari game series, known for its large state space and sparse rewards, making it challenging for reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MontezumaRevenge

dcterms:creator: A. Ecoffet
J. Huizinga
J. Lehman
K. O. Stanley
J. Clune
dcterms:description: Gravitar is another challenging Atari game that requires effective exploration strategies due to its complex state space and sparse rewards.
dcterms:title: Gravitar

dcterms:creator: A. Ecoffet
J. Huizinga
J. Lehman
K. O. Stanley
J. Clune
dcterms:description: Frostbite is an Atari game that presents a hard exploration challenge, requiring agents to navigate a complex environment with sparse rewards.
dcterms:title: Frostbite

dcterms:creator: A. Ecoffet
J. Huizinga
J. Lehman
K. O. Stanley
J. Clune
dcterms:description: The Atari dataset encompasses a variety of games, including Montezuma's Revenge, Gravitar, and Frostbite, which are used to evaluate exploration strategies in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Atari
